A.name: Подразделение
A.caption: Подразделение
A.formula: select inv.establishment from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Тип документа
A.caption: Документ
A.formula: select dt.code from contracts inv, doctypes dt where inv.doctypeid=dt.id and inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Номер договора
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select inv.docnumb from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Дата договора
A.caption: Дата
A.formula: select inv.docdate from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Предмет договора
A.caption: Предмет договора
A.formula: select inv.name from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Номер инвентарной карточки
A.caption: Номер инвентарной карточки
A.formula: select inv.cardnumb from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: МОЛ (Бухгалтерский учет)
A.caption: МОЛ (Бухгалтерский учет)
A.formula: select inv.exec from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: Подразделение (Бухгалтерский учет)
A.caption: Подразделение (Бухгалтерский учет)
A.formula: select inv.establishment from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: Заводской номер
A.caption: Заводской номер
A.formula: select inv.worsnumber from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: Изготовитель
A.caption: Изготовитель
A.formula: select inv.producer from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: Дата выпуска
A.caption: Дата выпуска
A.formula: select inv.dateissue from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: Дата ввода в эксплуатацию
A.caption: Дата ввода в эксплуатацию
A.formula: select inv.datecommissioning from inventory inv where inv.id = @INVENTORYID ::bigint

A.name: Дата списания
A.caption: Дата списания
A.formula: select min(h.dateoperation) from inventoryhistory h where h.INVENTORYID=@INVENTORYID ::bigint and h.typeoperation='4'

A.name: Номер договора
A.caption: Номер
A.formula: select inv.docnumb from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Дата договора
A.caption: Дата
A.formula: select inv.docdate from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Заказчик
A.caption: Заказчик
A.formula: select inv.client from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Поставщик
A.caption: Поставщик
A.formula: select inv.contractor from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Предмет договора
A.caption: Предмет договора
A.formula: select inv.name from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Сумма договора
A.caption: Сумма договора
A.formula: select inv.summ from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Дата начала действия
A.caption: Дата начала действия
A.formula: select inv.datestart from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Дата окончания действия
A.caption: Дата окончания действия
A.formula: select inv.datefinish from contracts inv where inv.id = @CONTRACTSID ::bigint

A.name: Модель
A.caption: Модель
A.formula: select m.model from equipment inv, modelequipment m where inv.id = @EQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.modelequipmentid = m.id

A.name: Принадлежность
A.caption: Принадлежность
A.formula: select m.code from equipment inv, owner m where inv.id = @EQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.ownerid = m.id

A.name: Местоположение
A.caption: Местоположение
A.formula: select m.code from equipment inv, locations m where inv.id = @EQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.locationsid = m.id

A.name: Описание
A.caption: Описание
A.formula: select inv.description from equipment inv where inv.id = @EQUIPMENTID ::bigint

A.name: Версия
A.caption: Версия
A.formula: select m.version from software inv, versionsoftware m where inv.id = @SOFTWAREID ::bigint and inv.versionsoftwareid = m.id

A.name: Модель
A.caption: Модель
A.formula: select m.model from officeequipment inv, modelofficeequipment m where inv.id = @OFFICEEQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.modelofficeequipmentid = m.id

A.name: Местоположение
A.caption: Местоположение
A.formula: select m.code from officeequipment inv, locations m where inv.id = @OFFICEEQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.locationsid = m.id

A.name: Описание
A.caption: Описание
A.formula: select inv.description from officeequipment inv where inv.id = @OFFICEEQUIPMENTID ::bigint

A.name: Модель
A.caption: Модель
A.formula: select m.model from networksequipment inv, modelnetworksequipment m where inv.id = @NETWORKSEQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.modelnetworksequipmentid = m.id

A.name: Описание
A.caption: Описание
A.formula: select inv.description from networksequipment inv where inv.id = @NETWORKSEQUIPMENTID ::bigint

A.name: Местоположение
A.caption: Местоположение
A.formula: select m.code from networksequipment inv, locations m where inv.id = @NETWORKSEQUIPMENTID ::bigint and inv.locationsid = m.id

A.name: Модель
A.caption: Модель
A.formula: select m.model from communications inv, modelcommunicationfacilities m where inv.id = @COMMUNICATIONSID::bigint and inv.modelcommunicationfacilitiesid=m.id

A.name: Описание
A.caption: Описание
A.formula: select inv.description from communications inv where inv.id = @COMMUNICATIONSID::bigint

A.name: Местоположение
A.caption: Местоположение
A.formula: select m.code from communications inv, locations m where inv.id = @COMMUNICATIONSID::bigint and inv.locationsid = m.id

A.name: Фамилия
A.caption: Фамилия
A.formula: select inv.surname from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Имя
A.caption: Имя
A.formula: select inv.firstname from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Отчество
A.caption: Отчество
A.formula: select inv.middlename from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Должность
A.caption: Должность
A.formula: select inv.post from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Дата приема
A.caption: Дата приема
A.formula: select inv.datereceipt from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Дата увольнения
A.caption: Дата увольнения
A.formula: select inv.datedismissal from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint

A.name: Статус исполнения должности
A.caption: Статус исполнения должности
A.formula: select inv.condition from employees inv where inv.id = @EMPLOYEESID ::bigint
